Summary: Very far away, blurred because of rotation but disc shaped.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Green
There were no other sightings in Green on or around August 29th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at my computer and there is a window next to me looking out over a 9 acre field. I had an eerie feeling that something was out there because this has happened to me several times before. I grabbed my camcorder (on tripod) and started looking to the left of the giant pine tree and there were two disc-shaped objects far out there. Just like before I knew if I zoomed in, the picture would be blurred beyond recognition so I snapped a few only after I saw them move in unison back and forth very quickly. I was going to take videos but after I snapped the last pic, they moved so fast to the right behind the pine tree and were gone. I went outside with my camera but they were nowhere to be found. This was not my first encounter, WE ARE NOT alone. An added note: I keep my window very clean, these were not bugs or dots on my window.
